locations.description: Food pantry service - Guests can visit twice a month. May come into building and place client choice order

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Guest can visit once a month. Walk ins welcome, limited amount of people in at one time, pre-packed bags. Thrift store: Sat 9-12

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: They serve a maximum of 75 families per day. No appointment necessary. Every family is served once a month. Call pantry to verify the weeks they are open

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food Pantry - Guests can visit pantry twice a month- Client choice

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry offering monthly visits for pantry items and multiple visits for produce. Walk-up or call-in pickup available with curbside service. Also operates soup kitchen on Tuesdays 9am-1:30pm. Produce available Mondays and Wednesdays 10-12, 1-3.

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry that accepts everyone, call for an appointment. Tuesday-Friday 9am-3pm. May be able to serve emergency food on Mondays

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Guests can visit once a month. walk in. Pre-packed with the exception of meat, dairy products and produce

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry operated by Trinity Alliance of the Capital Region. Follows street listing. Guest can utilize pantry twice a month. Walk-ins welcome at any time, client choice. Produce only Tuesdays and Thursdays after 11am. Serves every 14 days

locations.name: Albany
locations.address: Campus Center Building, Room 329, 1400 Washington Avenue, Albany, NY 12222
locations.description: Food pantry serving current UAlbany students, staff, faculty, and their families. Hours vary during academic semesters, finals, and school breaks.

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry where guests can utilize pantry 1-2 times a month. Must call for appointment, client choice available. Also offers soup kitchen services Monday & Thursday 11:45-12:45.

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry operated by Israel AME Church

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry operated by Mater Christi Church. Updated proof of address is required every 4 months. Will serve emergency bags by appointment. The pantry is not open on any 5th Monday of the month. On Monday holidays, the pantry day is moved to the next day (Tuesday). Guests can visit twice a month Walk in welcome. Client choice

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry providing food assistance to community members. Entrance on St. James Pl- door on the right side of the parking lot. Guests can visit once a month. Walk ins welcome. Bags are handed out a window after client sign in. Guests can visit once a month, but can come every week for produce and bread.

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry operated by FOCUS Covenant Congregations. Guest can visit twice a month. Call in order ahead, pick up at appt. time. We bring groceries to door, no one inside. Come to door. Preorder preferred, but will take walk-ins

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry service. Please use Steuben St. entrance. Guests can visit 1 time 2 if necessary. walk in, limited amount of people inside building, client choice

Free weekly meal Saturday 4:30-5:30

locations.description: Food pantry operated by St. Luke's Roman Catholic Church. Pantry entrance is off of Division St. NO WALK-INS ALLOWED - must call before 10:00 AM to place an order. Must provide proof of Schenectady County address.
